questions.question: Every book of A Series of Unfortunate Events is dedicated to Beatrice, followed by a short message. Which of the following sentences was never written on the dedication page?

options.text: To Beatrice, when I first saw you, I was breathless. Now, you are.
To Beatrice, summer without you is as cold as winter. Winter without you is even colder.
To Beatrice, I always used to sleep late on weekends. Alas, now you do, also.
To Beatrice, you will always be in my mind, in my heart, and in your grave.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: To Beatrice, I always used to sleep late on weekends. Alas, now you do, also.
